Atlas Mountains through Tizi n'Tichka pass (the highest road in Africa) Visit the fortified Kasbah Ait Ben Haddou (a UNESCO World Heritage site) Discover Ouarzazate city, movies studios, Roses Valley, Dades Valley, Todra Valley, Merzouga Dunes and Daraa Valley Spend 2 nights in 2 different locations, the first at Todra Gorges and the second at a private traditional tent in Merzouga Desert with Nomadic people Enjoy a camel ride in the fabulous Erg Chebbi and see the sunset view on 2nd day of the tour and the sunrise on the 3rd day of the tour Take a different route back to Ourzazate via Daraa Valley to Marrakech
strTitle: From Marrakech: 3-Day Private Tour to Sahara Desert
